# Class CustomNode`Abstract`

Base class for creating custom (user-defined) nodes.

Subclasses must implement the `process` method. A unique node type is automatically registered once per subclass, and used when producing the graph configuration via `toGraphConfigNode`.

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/dsl/nodes/builtin/custom_node.CustomNode))

  * [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode)
    * CustomNode



##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

[TO_GRAPH_CONFIG_NODE] addComponent getFirstComponent process toGraphConfigNode

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new CustomNode(props?: [CustomNodeProps](/interfaces/graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_custom_node.CustomNodeProps)): [CustomNode]()

Creates a new `CustomNode`.

#### Parameters

    * props: [CustomNodeProps](/interfaces/graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_custom_node.CustomNodeProps) = {}

Custom node options including optional `executionConfig`.

#### Returns [CustomNode]()

#### Remarks

Subclasses can pass an `executionConfig` object to surface additional execution-time properties in the generated graph configuration.

Overrides [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode).[constructor](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode#constructor)




## Methods

### [TO_GRAPH_CONFIG_NODE]

  * "[TO_GRAPH_CONFIG_NODE]"(): [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)

Converts this DSL node to a serializable graph configuration node.

Note: This indirection through a symbol preserves encapsulation while still allowing builder utilities to access the conversion.

#### Returns [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)

Inherited from [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode).[[TO_GRAPH_CONFIG_NODE]](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode#to_graph_config_node)

Adds an internal component to this node.

#### Parameters

The component to attach to this node.

#### Returns this

This node instance.

### `Protected`getFirstComponent

  * getFirstComponent(): [AbstractComponent](./graph_dsl_components_abstract_component.AbstractComponent)

Returns the first internal component attached to this node.

#### Returns [AbstractComponent](./graph_dsl_components_abstract_component.AbstractComponent)

#### Throws

If no components were added to the node.

Inherited from [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode).[getFirstComponent](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode#getfirstcomponent)




### `Abstract`process

  * process(context: ProcessContext, ...inputs: any[]): any

The execution function of the custom node. Must be implemented by subclasses.

#### Parameters

    * context: ProcessContext
    * ...inputs: any[]

#### Returns any




### `Protected`toGraphConfigNode

  * toGraphConfigNode(): [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)

Converts this custom node to a graph configuration node, including the registered type and the provided execution configuration.

#### Returns [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)

Overrides [AbstractNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode).[toGraphConfigNode](./graph_dsl_nodes_builtin_abstract_node.AbstractNode#tographconfignode)
